alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Cass; Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Panola; Rusk; Upshur (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 9:58AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Little River, northwestern Miller, Marion, Cass, western Harrison, northwestern Panola, northern Rusk, southeastern Bowie, southeastern Upshur and Gregg Counties through 1030 AM CST... At 958 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ogden to near New London. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Longview, Texarkana, Marshall, Kilgore, White Oak, Atlanta, Wake Village, Ashdown, Hallsville, Nash, Hooks, Overton, Jefferson, Linden, Queen City, Tatum, Redwater, Maud, Red Lick and New London. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bowie; Cass; Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Panola; Rusk; Upshur
